class GrPolygonUberPatchGroup

builds calculates UV's for the group specified and builds uber-texture patches.

ctor & dtor

iterate through all polygons and classify them based on their face normal.

float GrPolygonUberPatchGroup::GetTexelsPerMeter (  )  const [inline]

returns the number of texels for each meter in the world. This is based on the plane which a polygon is projected onto and UV mapped.
